pages.text: Tool Bindings can be seen as the finishing touch for a tool.$(br2)They can be used to compensate for the shortcomings of your $(l)$(l:tool_part_category)Tool Head's$() material, or add a little extra on top of an already high stat.$(br2)Make sure to keep in mind that Tool Bindings add to tool stats $(o)before$() the stats are multiplied by the $(l)$(l:part_tool_handle)Handle$().
A simple binding can be crafted from leather. Most other bindings are crafted at the $(l:alloygery:block_smithing_anvil)Smithing Anvil$().
